DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether a glaucoma therapy is safe and effective in treating patients with open-angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of a Glaucoma Therapy to Treat Open-Angle Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: 18 years of age or older Diagnosis of openangle glaucoma Other protocoldefined inclusion criteria may apply Under 18 Pregnant Other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply
